alert.note: Alert for Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 6:27PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Drew County through 700 PM CDT... At 627 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Tillar, or 11 miles northwest of Dermott, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tillar... Jerome... Baxter... Enon... Collins... Selma... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
